appSubtitle: Quickly shape slide styles and themes to craft clear, structured slide prompts
contentPlaceholder: Paste topic notes, context, and key points...
resultReadyHint: Preview is ready. Copy or export the generated prompt
resultEmptyHint: Enter source content to generate a live prompt preview.
emptyPrompt: No prompt yet. Fill in controls and content to generate output.
customOptionTranslationHint: Tip: Custom options are not translated automatically.

style-default-1.name: Photorealistic
style-default-1.promptHint: Ultra-detailed, great for product showcases or scenario simulations

style-default-2.name: Cinematic Lighting
style-default-2.promptHint: Emphasizes light/shadow and tension; adds narrative and premium feel

style-default-3.name: Minimalist
style-default-3.promptHint: Ample whitespace and simple colors; perfect for highlighting the core idea

style-default-4.name: Flat Design
style-default-4.promptHint: 2D, clean and easy to recognize; a modern favorite for slides

style-default-5.name: Isometric
style-default-5.promptHint: 2.5D perspective; great for data centers, offices, or architecture diagrams

style-default-6.name: 3D Render / C4D Style
style-default-6.promptHint: Strong depth and modern tech feel; often paired with Octane Render

style-default-7.name: Memphis Design
style-default-7.promptHint: Playful geometric shapes and vivid colors; great for creative pitches

style-default-8.name: Cyberpunk
style-default-8.promptHint: Neon and high-tech vibe; perfect for future tech or software stories

style-default-9.name: Line Art
style-default-9.promptHint: Built from clean strokes; great for flowchart backdrops or icon-like visuals

style-default-10.name: Synthwave
style-default-10.promptHint: Retro-futuristic vibe with strong purples and blues

style-default-11.name: Pixel Art
style-default-11.promptHint: Nostalgic game vibe; great for fun, retro project explainers

style-default-12.name: Risograph
style-default-12.promptHint: Grainy, overlapping print look; very artsy and design-forward

style-default-13.name: Bauhaus
style-default-13.promptHint: Geometric shapes, primary colors, balance of form and function; very modern

style-default-14.name: Low Poly
style-default-14.promptHint: Faceted geometric surfaces; modern and abstract

style-default-15.name: Watercolor
style-default-15.promptHint: Soft washes and blends; warm, human, and empathetic storytelling

style-default-16.name: Oil Painting
style-default-16.promptHint: Thick, textured strokes; suits classic, serious, or historical topics

style-default-17.name: Ukiyo-e
style-default-17.promptHint: Traditional Japanese aesthetic; fits culture, beauty, or market-specific topics

style-default-18.name: Pop Art
style-default-18.promptHint: High saturation and comic feel; great for bold statements or ads

style-default-19.name: Paper Cutout
style-default-19.promptHint: Layered, tactile look; cozy visuals with a dimensional feel

style-default-20.name: Charcoal Sketch
style-default-20.promptHint: Rough, thoughtful strokes; great for emphasizing concepts or prototyping
